title: Draconian annihilator
data:

*For a list of all draconians, see [list of draconians](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians").*

| draconian annihilator q [![Draconian annihilator.png](/images/6/65/Draconian_annihilator.png)](/File:Draconian_annihilator.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                |

| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A draconian that uses powerful conjurations to destroy anyone who dares to stand in its way.***“Trogdor was a man! I mean, he was a dragon-man! Or... maybe he was just a dragon. ... And the Trogdor comes in the night!” -The Brothers Chaps, “Trogdor”. 2003. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Draconian annihilators** are comparable to the [deep elf annihilators](/Deep_elf_annihilator "Deep elf annihilator") found in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"), but tougher and with resistances that complicate the fight. Like their elven colleagues, they like to cast high-level [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"). They can be found in [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot") and, rarely, in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"). Randomly generated annihilators are [yellow draconians](/Yellow_draconian "Yellow draconian"), complete with [acidic breath](/Spit_Acid "Spit Acid").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                                        |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d21)                              | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Lehudib's Crystal Spear](/Lehudib%27s_Crystal_Spear "Lehudib's Crystal Spear") (3d35) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                                                | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d29)                                             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow") (3d23)                                    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

For squishy characters, turning a corner and finding yourself face-to-face with an annihilator is an emergency, and you should waste no time putting some distance between the two of you via [Blink](/Blink "Blink") or other means to escape the range of their most brutal spells. Melee-focused characters will want to do the opposite, engaging them and luring them into physically attacking you as quickly as possible. If you encounter draconian annihilators in groups, killing them should be a high priority.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), classed draconians could randomly generate as any colour.
html:
Draconian annihilator

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all draconians, see list of draconians.

draconian annihilator q 
HP 52-107
HD 16
XP 1490
Speed 10
AC 9
EV 10
Will 40
Attack1 15 (hit: plain)


Resistances rF+
rSticky
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type draconian, draconian
Flags Cold-blooded
Speaks
A draconian that uses powerful conjurations to destroy anyone who dares to stand in its way.

“Trogdor was a man!
I mean, he was a dragon-man!
Or... maybe he was just a dragon.
...
And the Trogdor comes in the night!”
-The Brothers Chaps, “Trogdor”. 2003.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Draconian annihilators are comparable to the deep elf annihilators found in the Elven Halls, but tougher and with resistances that complicate the fight. Like their elven colleagues, they like to cast high-level Conjurations. They can be found in the Realm of Zot and, rarely, in the Abyss. Randomly generated annihilators are yellow draconians, complete with acidic breath.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Lightning Bolt (3d21) Wizard flag
Slot2 Lehudib's Crystal Spear (3d35) Wizard flag
Slot3 Blink Wizard flag
Slot4 Iron Shot (3d29) Wizard flag
Slot5 Poison Arrow (3d23) Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

For squishy characters, turning a corner and finding yourself face-to-face with an annihilator is an emergency, and you should waste no time putting some distance between the two of you via Blink or other means to escape the range of their most brutal spells. Melee-focused characters will want to do the opposite, engaging them and luring them into physically attacking you as quickly as possible. If you encounter draconian annihilators in groups, killing them should be a high priority.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, classed draconians could randomly generate as any colour.
